link_desc:
This plugin allows to connect Zabbix to Grafana metric dashboard (grafana.org). Use powerfull Grafana features with Zabbix! See features overview and dashboards examples at Grafana-Zabbix Live demo site: http://play.grafana-zabbix.org

Features:

Flexible metric editor
Select multiple items by single query. Regex filters for items and hosts.

Templated dashboards
Group, host, application or item names can be replaced with a template variable. This allows you to create generic dashboards that can quickly be changed to show stats for a specific cluster, server or application.

Annotations support
Display zabbix events on graphs. Show acknowledges for problems.
author: Alexander Zobnin
